items.title: New antibody shot could help protect babies from RSV
items.description: A newly approved shot could soon help protect babies from respiratory syncytial virus (RSV), the top cause of hospitalization in U.S. infants.

items.title: Gut microbes may help in recognizing and treating pancreatic cancer
items.description: Pancreatic cancer is a severe illness and major challenge in cancer medicine since it is difficult to diagnose, while potential therapies are scarce. ...

items.title: The complex reality of college student mental health: Data reveal both challenges and positive trends
items.description: The word "crisis" is used frequently and, I would argue, inaccurately, to depict the psychological well-being of today's college students.
